name: Alchemy Garden (itch) (MadSushi)
description:
Alchemy Garden is a peaceful game where gardening and potion creation are mixed.

Explore the world in search of seeds and components.

You can go out and explore the different biomes to find all kinds of plants and components for your experiments.

Design your landscapes

You decide where you want to plant. Use the land to plant as if it were an orchard, or you can create beautiful landscapes, there is no grid so you are totally free to create your surroundings.

Create potions in your Alchemy Lab

You can set up your own alchemy laboratory at home, place the furniture wherever you want and decorate your home to your liking.

Run your own Alchemy Shop

You can sell your plants or your potions to the villagers and earn some money with which to buy more components, furniture or even other houses

Weekly tasks

Different tasks will appear every week that you will have to complete in a limited number of days.

EARLY ACCESS

Alchemy Garden is currently in the alpha stage, which means that there are still changes and improvements in the gameplay, graphics and content. Buy Alchemy Garden only if you are aware that it is a game in development.
